Articles.Content: I don't understand how the content count system works. Whenever I use the mobile version to reply or make new content, it doesnt show up. When you reply, is it considered content? Or is it only when you make new threads?

6 hours ago, Atlas2342 said:

I don't understand how the content count system works. Whenever I use the mobile version to reply or make new content, it doesnt show up. When you reply, is it considered content? Or is it only when you make new threads?

Content count is how many posts you have. It's post count with a different name.  If posts from mobile don't show up, make sure you're signed in. Not sure why it wouldn't show up otherwise.
